bits

Class BitAnder

  • java.lang.Object
    • bits.Problem
      • bits.BitAnder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    bits.IProblem, java.lang.Iterable<bits.IClause>

    public class BitAnder
extends bits.Problem
implements bits.IProblem
    An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on three IBooleanVariables. For example, the IProblem p defined by

    IProblem p=new BitAnder(x,y,z);

    is satisfied if and only if the following Boolean relation is satisfied:

    z == x & y

    Since:
    2005/02/09
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Kerry Michael Soileau

    email: ksoileau2@yahoo.com

    website: http://kerrysoileau.com/index.html
